    • Class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • objName

          java.lang.String objName
          This field holds the displayed name of the object

        • realName

          java.lang.String realName
          This field holds the actual name of the object

        • hiddenName

          java.lang.String hiddenName
          This field is what will be displayed when the object is hidden

        • objId

          int objId
          This field is the object ID, unique to each object type and used for comparing objects

        • EMPTY_OBJECT

          java.lang.String EMPTY_OBJECT
          This field represents an empty object that is hidden

        • EMPTY_OBJECT_REAL

          java.lang.String EMPTY_OBJECT_REAL
          This field represents an empty slot that is not hidden

        • pos

          int[] pos
          This field holds the coordinates of an object to make finding it easier.

    • Class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Player extends GameObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • hasShield

          boolean hasShield
          This field represents a boolean that is true when the Player collects the Shield object.

        • hasBriefCase

          boolean hasBriefCase
          This field represents a boolean that becomes true when the Player disarms the bomb

        • objID

          int objID
          This field represents the unique ID of the object, used for comparing two GameObjects

        • ammo

          int ammo
          This field represents an int containing the number of bullets that the has. This number can only be 1 or 0

        • xPosition

          int xPosition
          This field is part of a pair of integers that contain the position of the Player character.

        • yPosition

          int yPosition

        • xpre

          int xpre
          This field is part of a pair of integers that contain the next position of the Player

        • ypre

          int ypre

        • numLives

          int numLives
          This field represents an int containing the number of lives that the Player has left. This number decreases by 1 every time the Player is killed by an Enemy

        • lookPosY1

          int lookPosY1
          This field is part of a group of integers that reveal locations on the Grid depending on the user's choice of "look" direction

        • lookPosY2

          int lookPosY2
          This field is part of a group of integers that reveal locations on the Grid depending on the user's choice of "look" direction

        • lookPosX1

          int lookPosX1
          This field is part of a group of integers that reveal locations on the Grid depending on the user's choice of "look" direction

        • lookPosX2

          int lookPosX2
          This field is part of a group of integers that reveal locations on the Grid depending on the user's choice of "look" direction

        • plrMoveDir

          java.lang.String plrMoveDir
          This field represents a String containing the direction in which the Player moved

        • m

          int m
          This field represents the turns remaining on shield use as an int
